commits.content: Website Link is here https://randomforestbasedcroprecomendationsystem-snpx6y9fzo6ag6uxg4cln.streamlit.app/ [text](https://huggingface.co/spaces/AnukulChandra/Crop_Recommendation_System) Go to this link or copy and pest in your Browser to Enter the website. # ğŸŒ¾ Crop Recommendation System A Machine Learningâ€“based **Crop Recommendation System** that predicts the most suitable crop based on **soil nutrients and weather conditions**. The application is built using **Streamlit** for an interactive UI and a **Random Forest model** for prediction. --- Website Link is here https://randomforestbasedcroprecomendationsystem-snpx6y9fzo6ag6uxg4cln.streamlit.app/ [text](https://huggingface.co/spaces/AnukulChandra/Crop_Recommendation_System) Go to this link or copy and pest in your Browser to Enter the website. --- ## ğŸš€ Features * ğŸŒ± Predicts the **best crop** using: * Nitrogen (N) * Phosphorus (P) * Potassium (K) * Temperature * Humidity * pH value * Rainfall * ğŸ“Š Shows **Top 3 crop predictions** with confidence scores * ğŸ–¼ï¸ Displays crop images for better visualization * ğŸ“ˆ Interactive confidence histogram * ğŸ§  Trained using **Random Forest Classifier** * â˜ï¸ Deployable on **Hugging Face Spaces (Docker + Streamlit)** --- ## ğŸ§  Machine Learning Model * **Algorithm:** Random Forest Classifier * **Training Data:** Crop_Recommendation.csv * **Target:** Crop name * **Saved Artifacts:** * `crop_model.pkl` * `label_encoder.pkl` --- ## ğŸ—‚ï¸ Project Structure ``` . â”œâ”€â”€ app.py # Streamlit application â”œâ”€â”€ Dockerfile # Docker configuration â”œâ”€â”€ requirements.txt # Python dependencies â”œâ”€â”€ crop_model.pkl # Trained ML model â”œâ”€â”€ label_encoder.pkl # Label encoder â”œâ”€â”€ Crop_Recommendation.csv # Dataset â”œâ”€â”€ images/ # Crop images â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ apple.jpg â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ banana.jpg â”‚ â””â”€â”€ ... â””â”€â”€ README.md ``` --- ## ğŸ³ Docker Deployment ### Build Docker image ```bash docker build -t crop-recommendation . ``` ### Run container ```bash docker run -p 7860:7860 crop-recommendation ``` Open in browser: ğŸ‘‰ `http://localhost:7860` --- ## â˜ï¸ Hugging Face Spaces Deployment This project is **fully compatible with Hugging Face Spaces (Docker runtime)**. Steps: 1. Create a new Space 2. Select **Docker** as SDK 3. Push this repository 4. Click **Factory Rebuild** The app will be live automatically ğŸš€ --- ## ğŸ“¦ Requirements Main libraries used: * streamlit * pandas * numpy * scikit-learn * joblib * plotly --- ## ğŸ“¸ UI Preview The UI includes: * Sidebar input sliders (like Streamlit default) * Modern crop recommendation cards * Top-3 prediction cards * Interactive histogram with crop images --- ## ğŸ“œ License This project is licensed under the **MIT License**.
